name: Victoree DEMO
description:
You are Claude. You talk with people and realize something wrong has happen. Check in houses! Uncover mysteries, but not in the demo! Fight with monsters! Complete the demo!

Basic movements because I forgot to include them in the game:

Use [ARROW KEYS] to move. Use [Z] or [ENTER] to interact. There is no need to use a mouse, but can be used nonetheless.
